About Me

Who Am I?

Hi I'm Dilakshan Sivaruban, a 22-year-old Software Engineering student at Centennial College, originally from Sri Lanka.

My passion for technology and innovation has driven me to dive deep into the world of software development. With a commitment to continuous learning and a dedication to diversity and inclusion in tech, I'm excited to contribute to the ever-evolving landscape of software engineering. Let's shape the future one line of code at a time!
